data.message: Session: Duro architecture planning - feedback loop before tools: Established implementation spec for compounding engine. Phase 1: Episode + Evaluation + Memory Update (MVP). Key rule enforced: facts require source + type + freshness. Confidence decay on-access. Dumb deterministic rules, not RL. This is the pivot from "bigger brain with gadgets" to "system that compounds."
